betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Arcane Levitation Platform: This device consumes Vis to generate an air current that pushes entities in the direction it is facing. It can be toggled on and off using a redstone signal.

Upon first placement, the default air current height is 8 blocks. You can adjust the levitation distance by clicking the trigger on the bottom of the platform (increasing the distance will increase the Vis consumption):

4 blocks (8 Vis/minute)
8 blocks (16 Vis/minute)
16 blocks (32 Vis/minute)
32 blocks (64 Vis/minute)
While a living entity is levitating, 1 Vis is consumed per second.

This platform can be used to create mob farms or other automated systems.
